notes.note: This course may be taken for 3 or 4 credits. All students must initially enroll in LEC 1, DIS 1 for 3 credits. To earn one additional credit, students (juniors and seniors only) must apply in first week of course and be accepted into special topics component of course held in conjunction with Cornell's Writing in the Majors Program. If course full, contact ct259@cornell.edu to be placed on waitlist. This does NOT guarantee enrollment. Decisions regarding admission to course will be sent via email.
